data.comment: The match is underway in Curitiba.
Throw-in Bahia.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Bahia.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Bahia.
Bahia are caught offside.
In the minute 4, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Bahia throw-in in Paranaense's half.
Paranaense push upfield but Ricardo Marques Ribeiro quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 8, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 11, Free kick Paranaense.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
In the minute 14, Important block from the Paranaense defence as Gilberto fires in a strike for Bahia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 17, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro waits before resuming play because Gilberto for Bahia is still down.
Gilberto is back on the pitch.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 20, Bahia's Rodriguinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
Paranaense are pushing forward but Erick's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paranaense push forward at Arena da Baixada and Leo Cittadini gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bahia defence.
In the minute 26, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Erick (Paranaense) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Paranaense are coming forward and Abner Vinicius gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Bahia at Arena da Baixada.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Fabio Augusto Luciano Da Silva (Paranaense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 33, Saldanha is replacing Gilberto for the away team.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 37, Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Paranaense in Curitiba.
Erick of Paranaense gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 39, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Bahia a goal kick.
Saldanha (Bahia) has received a yellow card from Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 43, Erick of Paranaense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Bahia.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Paranaense throw-in in Bahia's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Pedrinho of Paranaense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Curitiba.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Arena da Baixada.
Paranaense are whistled for offside.
Clayson is replacing Elber for Bahia at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 49, Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 51, In Curitiba, Clayson of Bahia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
At Arena da Baixada, Bahia are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 52, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 53, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Paranaense.
Jonathan for Paranaense has been booked by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Bahia.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 55, Fabio Augusto Luciano Da Silva's header is off-target for Paranaense.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Bahia a goal kick.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Bahia.
In Curitiba, Bahia push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Bahia in the half of Paranaense.
At Arena da Baixada, Thiago Heleno has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a throw-in for Paranaense, close to Bahia's area.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Eduardo Maciel de Barros is making the team's first substitution at Arena da Baixada with Renato Kayzer replacing Pedrinho.
Eduardo Maciel de Barros (Paranaense) is making a second substitution, with Jorginho replacing Jonathan.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 67, Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Juninho (Bahia) strikes at Arena da Baixada but his header is cleared.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Bahia.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Christian heads in to make it 1-0 at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 70, That's a fine assist from Abner Vinicius.
The away team replace Rodriguinho with Marco Antonio.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Bahia at Arena da Baixada.
The away team have replaced Ramires with Rossi. This is the fourth substitution made today by Claudio Prates.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 74, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Bahia throw-in in Paranaense's half.
Bahia's Marco Antonio gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Paranaense defender.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
In the minute 78, Important block from the Paranaense defence as Marco Antonio fires in a strike for Bahia.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, An attacking Bahia player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Clayson (Bahia) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
Corner awarded to Bahia.
In the minute 84, Bahia are pushing forward but Clayson's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Eduardo Maciel de Barros is making the team's fifth substitution at Arena da Baixada with Jaime Alvarado replacing Christian.
In the minute 85, Paranaense make their fourth substitution with Ravanelli replacing Fabio Augusto Luciano Da Silva.
Carlos Eduardo is on a sub for Leo Cittadini for Paranaense.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Bahia.
Saldanha for Bahia is whistled offside.
In the minute 87, Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 88, Bahia have a goal kick.
Claudio Prates (Bahia) is making a fifth substitution, with Ramon replacing Ronaldo.
Free kick Bahia.
Paranaense's Jaime Alvarado has been booked in Curitiba.
Saldanha (Bahia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Bahia close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
8 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Paranaense needs to be cautious. Bahia have an attacking throw-in.
Bahia's Ernando misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Can Bahia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Bahia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
Carlos Eduardo for Paranaense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Bahia a goal kick.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Paranaense are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena da Baixada.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
